catentdesc.name: Gusso Mini Denim Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Mini denim skirt with gold hardware and rugged look
catentdesc.longdescription: Smart and rugged looking, this denim mini skirt looks ready for anything. Adding to the outdoor look is the distressed front and the frayed hem. The gold hardware at the front pockets garner attention while the side slits and standard fit gives you free movement. The skirt also features belt loop waistband and zip fly with button closure.

catentdesc.name: Albini Pleated Mini Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Mini skirt with elastic waist and gathered pleats
catentdesc.longdescription: This mini skirt design features a flocked finish, fitted elastic waist, and a pull on style. The fine gathered pleats add charm and body to this fresh lightweight woven skirt.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Black Pleated Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Black skirt with smoked waistband and pleats
catentdesc.longdescription: Young at heart, this simple black skirt with a smoked wide waistband has a pull on design. The gathering at the waist ensures that the fall of the pleats are well defined. Ending just above the knees, this skirt can be teamed with a dressy or a formal top.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Gray Flannel Pencil Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Gray flannel skirt with straight lines
catentdesc.longdescription: Simple, yet giving a strong statement, this solid gray flannel skirt is an essential for your work wardrobe. The slit at the back hem gives you room, while the back zipper closure provides ease to wear it.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Dressy Denim Mini Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Denim mini skirt with dressy feel and seam detailing
catentdesc.longdescription: Get ready to party in something comfortable and dressy. The seam detailing provided at the hem and at the pockets give definition to this smart skirt. This design also features standard fit, belt loop waistband, and zip fly with button closure.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Layered Check Mini Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Mini skirt with large checks and layering
catentdesc.longdescription: Casual and dressy, this mini skirt can be teamed with boots to enhance the appeal. The layered look with the large checks add spunk to your wardrobe. The wide waistband with the pull on design is easy to wear and gives a bubbly look.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Rutched Black Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Rutched black skirt with hidden back zipper and hook and eye closure
catentdesc.longdescription: Ease your transition between office and dinner with this sophisticated black skirt. The rutched look boosts the style and enhances your figure. Providing a elegant silhouette are the straight lines and the smooth finish. The hidden back zipper with the hook and eye closure makes it easy to slip on, while the stretch fabric gives it a bodycon fit.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Black Satin Overlay Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Black satin skirt with twin overlay front and back zipper
catentdesc.longdescription: This elegant satin skirt is dressy and simple. The overlay at the front adds appeal to the silhouette and the thin waistband along with the slanted hemline add sophistication. The back zipper makes this skirt easy to slip on.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Gray Pencil Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Gray pencil skirt with straight lines and back zipper
catentdesc.longdescription: Elegant and chic, this gray pencil skirt is a pleasure to wear at work. Comfortable and fitted, this simple skirt has a slit at the back hem that makes it easy to move around in. This design with straight lines has a perfect silhouette and also features a back zipper closure.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Fitted Pencil Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Fitted pencil skirt with seam detailing
catentdesc.longdescription: An essential addition to your wardrobe, this black pencil skirt can be worn to work or for an evening out. Well-tailored and fitted, this skirt provides a slim silhouette. The seam detailing adds appeal to the skirt and ease of wear is provided by the slit at the back hem along with the back zipper.

catentdesc.name: Albini Mini Club Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Black mini skirt with a hint of flare
catentdesc.longdescription: Chic and smart, this black mini skirt can be teamed with a dressy top. The hint of flare and slightly rutched sides add appeal to this skirt. Ease of wear is provided by the back zipper and the slit at the back hem. Show off your legs in this well-tailored and fitted skirt.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Box Pleated Mini Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Mini skirt with box pleats and contrast hem
catentdesc.longdescription: Bright and cheerful, this orange mini skirt with a contrast black hem is sure to catch everyone 's eye. This design also features box pleats and button tab at the waist.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Plaid Low Waist Mini Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Plaid mini skirt with low waist and belt loop waistband
catentdesc.longdescription: This chic plaid mini skirt sits low on the waist and features a waistband with belt loops. The soft pleats that fall from the wide waistband gives the skirt a puffball look while the slant pockets provide convenience. The check design adds charm to this skirt.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Gray Pencil Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Gray pencil skirt featuring belt loop waistband
catentdesc.longdescription: Smart and contemporary, this gray pencil skirt with seam detailing and wide ribbed waistband is great for office. The belt loops give definition and the straight lines provide a slim silhouette. This skirt also features a back zipper closure and slit at the back hem.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Faded Denim Mini Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Faded denim mini skirt with belt loop waistband
catentdesc.longdescription: Teamed with a dressy top, this smart faded denim skirt is both feminine and charming. The seam detailing that defines the hem and pockets garner attention while the back slit and standard fit gives you free movement. The skirt also features belt loop waistband and zip fly with button closure.
